description: woman with her head bent down, wringing her hands, holding the handle of an orange and white fan with an organic design between her teeth; three fireflies in ULQ; woman wears a lavender kimono
markings: Artist’s seal: たいそ {Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 和田刀 {Wada tō}

portfolio: From Thirty-two Aspects of Behaviors (Fūzoku sanjūnisō 風俗三十二相)
text: No. 31 on the table of contents
title: Appearing Happy, Behavior of a Present-Day Geisha of the Meiji Period
